title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 31 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 31 2021
description:
The majority of Democrats trust the media, majority of Republicans do not trust the media. Clay describes his red pill media moment. Senator Mazie Hirono is wrong on Afghanistan. Number 45, President Trump, joins Clay and Buck to discuss the disaster in Afghanistan. Trump "Afghanistan is the greatest embarrassment in the history of the United States." Will Trump run in 2024? He gives some clues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
